summary: If you’re in or near the greater Chicagoland area, this is the time and place to see me.  Because event space is tight you should pre-register; the details on how to do that is here.  You can get pre-register until 5pm Central tomorrow, after which, I suppose, you’ll have to look in from the outside, […]
title: Reminder: Book Tour Starts Tomorrow (September 30)! Naperville, Illinois! Anderson’s Bookstore! 7PM!

summary: It's been about two months since I switched↗ my note-keeping efforts from Obsidian↗ to SilverBullet↗, and I've been really enjoying it.  SilverBullet is easy to deploy with Docker, and it's packed with useful features↗ without becoming slow or otherwise cumbersome.  Being able to access and write my notes from any device with a web browser has been super convenient...
title: Publishing (Selected) SilverBullet Notes with Quartz and GitHub Actions

summary: While visiting my mom today she reacted shocked—referring to my beard—saying, “Your hair came back. ”, and that it looks great.  Guess I’m keeping this thing now; a ringing endorsement if there ever was...

It's that time of year again.  Like the slow change of winter into spring when I feel restless to get out, and start exploring the world with long walks in my local park.  Autumn does the opposite to me...
title: Autumnal Changes
